action.action-desc: Mrs. Fletcher (for herself and Mr. Bilirakis) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to reauthorize the authority to grant certain exemptions, and for other purposes.

section.header: Reauthorizing the humanitarian device exemption profit incentive
section.text: Section 520(m)(6)(A)(iv) of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act (42 U.S.C. 360j(m)(6)(A)(iv)) is amended by striking 2022 and inserting 2027.

section.header: Reauthorizing the pediatric device consortia program
section.text: Section 305(e) of the Food and Drug Administration Amendments Act of 2007 (42 U.S.C. 282 note) is amended by striking fiscal years 2018 through 2022 and inserting fiscal years 2023 through 2027.
